generated.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
	<meta charset="UTF-8">
	<title>clip</title>
</head>
<body>
	<canvas id="canvas"></canvas>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		const WIDTH = 500,HEIGHT=500;
		let canvas = document.getElementById('canvas'),
			context = canvas.getContext('2d');
		let mousedownPos={},
			mousedownFlag;
		canvas.width = WIDTH;
		canvas.height = HEIGHT;

		function fillBG(){
			context.save();
			context.fillStyle = "#000";
			context.strokeStyle = '#000';
			context.fillRect(0,0,WIDTH,HEIGHT);
			context.restore();
		}

		function createBigCircle(){
			context.save();
			context.globalAlpha = 0.5;
			context.fillStyle = '#daa520';
			context.beginPath();
			context.arc(WIDTH/2,HEIGHT/2,200,0,2*Math.PI,true);
			context.closePath();
			context.fill();
			context.restore();
		}

		fillBG();
		createBigCircle();

		function erease(pos){
			context.save();
			context.beginPath();
			context.arc(pos.x,pos.y,30,0,2*Math.PI,true);
			context.closePath();
			context.clip();
			fillBG();
			context.stroke();
			context.restore();
		}
		function posToCanvas(pos){
			let bounding = canvas.getBoundingClientRect(),
				x ,y;
			x = pos.x - bounding.left;
			y = pos.y - bounding.top;
			return {x,y}
		}
		function mousedownEve(e){
			if(e.target.tagName == 'CANVAS'){
				mousedownFlag = true;
				let pos = posToCanvas({x:e.pageX,y:e.pageY});
				erease(pos);
			}
			
		}
		function mousemoveEve(e){
			if(mousedownFlag){
				let pos = posToCanvas({x:e.pageX,y:e.pageY});
				erease(pos);
			}
		}
		function mousedownUp(e){
			if(mousedownFlag){
				let pos = posToCanvas({x:e.pageX,y:e.pageY});
				erease(pos);
			}
			mousedownFlag = false;
		}
		document.addEventListener('mousedown',mousedownEve,false);
		document.addEventListener('mousemove',mousemoveEve,false);
		document.addEventListener('mouseup',mousedownUp,false);

	</script>
</body>
</html>
